title: COW DAYS
text: That's right, just in time for Cows Days, the world's 45th biggest rodeo and carnival.  Every fall, South Park celebrates Cow Days, and you're gonna be a part of it. You'll stay at the spectacular Super 7 hotel on Bernhardt Road , and enjoy festivities, including prizes, rides, and of course, the world-famous Running of the Cows!  Congratulations, Tom and Mary.

title: COW DAYS
text: Ladies and gentlemen, I am pleased to kick off the 14th Annual South Park Cow Days!  As most of you know, Cow Days is when we all get together to celebrate and thank the noble, gentle cows.  And now, the chairman of Cow Days, Jimbo Kern!

text: This year is a very special Cow Days because we are revealing our all-new Cow Memorial!  Which will live forever in South Park from this day forth. Release the curtain!

text: Hang on, Cartman!

title: COW DAYS
text: Wow, and this Vietnamese prostitute can really ride a bull!  I guess she's had a lot of practice, if you know what I mean.

title: COW DAYS
text: Aaah! Ten dollar!  Ten dollar, soldier boy!

title: COW DAYS
text: She's setting a new world record!

title: COW DAYS
text: Ming Li! Ming Li! Ming Li!

title: COW DAYS
text: Gaaah!  Heeee!

title: COW DAYS
text: Dude, that bull's gonna kill him.

title: COW DAYS
text: Go help him, Kenny!

title: COW DAYS
text: (Huh-uh, I ain't gonna get inside that ring! Aaah!)

title: COW DAYS
text: Oh my God, they killed Kenny!

title: COW DAYS
text: You bastard!

title: COW DAYS
text: And this brave little whore from the East has really put on a show for us today!  The winner of the bullriding contest: Ming Li!

title: COW DAYS
text: Hey, sucky-sucky? Only ten dollar.

title: COW DAYS
text: We did it, dude, we did it!

title: COW DAYS
text: the cows are gathered again before the Memorial, about 3 p.m. Behind some large rocks, FBI agents pop up and take aim at the cows

title: COW DAYS
text: Freeze, cows!  The game is over! You will now return to your respective towns!

title: COW DAYS
text: You hear that, cows? You're surrounded! There's no way out!

title: COW DAYS
text: You will now all march in an orderly fashion into this trailer!  Move!

title: COW DAYS
text: Hey. Where's she going? That's the wrong way, you stupid cow!

title: COW DAYS
text: Oh, dear Jesus, no!

title: COW DAYS
text: Mooooo!

title: COW DAYS
text: Nnoo!  They're killing themselves! Stop! Please!  Can't we do anything?! Oh, God, the humanity, Ned! The humanity!

title: COW DAYS
text: This is the first mass cow suicide I've seen in- at least eight months.

title: COW DAYS
text: Tom and Mary still wait in jail

title: COW DAYS
text: The carnival. The boys walk back to Toss-A-Ball

title: COW DAYS
text: Oh, you boys are back again, huh?

title: COW DAYS
text: Yeah. And we have $5000 this time.

title: COW DAYS
text: How many ball does that get us?

title: COW DAYS
text: Odline daur shunba shunba?

title: COW DAYS
text: Aw I ah- I tell you what, boys. Uh, I'm gonna be really nice and just- trade you the 5000 for the Terrance and Phillip dolls.

title: COW DAYS
text: You will?

title: COW DAYS
text: Wow, why'd you get so cool all of a sudden?

title: COW DAYS
text: We did it! You see, Cartman? You won us the Terrance and Phillip dolls!

title: COW DAYS
text: Ten dollar? Sucky-sucky?

title: COW DAYS
text: What are we gonna do with them?

title: COW DAYS
text: We should-

title: COW DAYS
text: What the-?

title: COW DAYS
text: Dude, these dolls are cheap rip-offs!

title: COW DAYS
text: After all that?! Shenanigans! Shenanigans! SHENANIGANS!

title: COW DAYS
text: What's all this?

title: COW DAYS
text: Officer Barbrady, I would like to reinstate my previous Shenanigans! This whole carnival is a rip-off!

title: COW DAYS
text: You know, uh, excuse me, but I agree. These rides are really stupid! Chamber of Farts isn't scary at all!

title: COW DAYS
text: Yeah, and the food is terrible!

title: COW DAYS
text: Hey, it's just a stupid rodeo. What do you expect?

title: COW DAYS
text: Ho-kay okay, let's calm down. People of South Park, do you declare Shenanigans on the carnival people?

title: COW DAYS
text: Yeah!

title: COW DAYS
text: Okay, carnival people, do you accept this decree of Shenanigans?

title: COW DAYS
text: What the hell are you talking about?! This whole town is screwy!

title: COW DAYS
text: Well, that settles it! Everybody grab a broom, it's Shenanigans!

title: COW DAYS
text: One in the afternoon. Jimbo, Ned, and some townsfolk are pushing the Cow Memorial back into the carnival area

title: COW DAYS
text: You found it! You found the memorial!

title: COW DAYS
text: Yeap.

title: COW DAYS
text: And the cows? Are they all back, too?

title: COW DAYS
text: They're dead, mayor. They're all dead.

title: COW DAYS
text: What?!

title: COW DAYS
text: Oho, it was awful!  Cow after cow taking its own life, and we could do nothing to stop them! Oh, God!

title: COW DAYS
text: Well, perhaps, one day, cows will learn that cults are never a good thing.

title: COW DAYS
text: I hope so, Mayor. I hope so. Uhud I need a cold beer and a burger.  What's all the ruckus over there?

title: COW DAYS
text: Sounds like somebody declared Shenanigans!

title: COW DAYS
text: Oh, hell, I have to run home and get my broom!

title: COW DAYS
text: The police station

title: COW DAYS
text: All right, you dammned carnival people. Into jail with-  Oooooh?

title: COW DAYS
text: Hey, aren't those the people we at first thought took the wooden cow?

title: COW DAYS
text: Yeah.

title: COW DAYS
text: Didn't we ever release them?

title: COW DAYS
text: Aw, I forgot all about them.

title: COW DAYS
text: Uh me, too.

title: COW DAYS
text: Oh my God! Officer Barbrady, ugh, you never had Tom and Mary in this cell.

title: COW DAYS
text: I didn't?

title: COW DAYS
text: No, no. In fact, they never came to South Park. We've never heard of them.

title: COW DAYS
text: Ooh, phew, I feel a lot better, then, although I could've swore that I had heard of them and they starved to death in my prison.

title: COW DAYS
text: The bus stop. Stan and Kyle are swimming in Terrance and Phillip dolls

title: COW DAYS
text: Say, Terrance, let's look for treasuh.

title: COW DAYS
text: Oh. Good idea, Phillip. Let's look for treasuh.

title: COW DAYS
text: What are you guys doing?

title: COW DAYS
text: Oh, hey, Cartman. How are you feeling?

title: COW DAYS
text: Oh, pretty good, except I had the weirdest dream last night.

title: COW DAYS
text: Really? What about?

title: COW DAYS
text: Well, I dreamt that I was a poor Vietnamese girl, and then you guys made me ride a big, scary bull, and then Leonardo Di Caprio gave me a spankin' for several hours.  Eeyy, where did you guys win all those Terrance and Phillip dolls?

title: COW DAYS
text: Oh-h. Nowhere.

title: COW DAYS
text: Wait a minute! You guys did make me ride that bull!

title: COW DAYS
text: No! Cartman, that was just a dream!

title: COW DAYS
text: Bye, Ming Li. Thanks again.

title: COW DAYS
text: Oh! Son of a bitch!
